reviewText: Good book if you're a Splat the Cat fan! Love the illustrations!
Excellent quality copy,  brand new as advertised. I would buy from this seller again.
Cute dvd..some stories read aloud for students!

My grandson has almost every Splat book, and they are his absolute favorites. He is a beginning reader, and Splat has really inspired his interest in other stories. At 5, he was obsessed with the Marvel heroes, and Splat and friends have directed him in what I feel is a much more appropriate path! The illustrations are absolutely delightful. We all love Splat, and hope those wonderful stories just keep coming!!!
We borrowed this from our library. Our son kept asking to take it out so we ordered for Christmas. Cute stories!
This will work quite well in my various aged classrooms. I enjoy having the books on a DVD to review as well.  Thank you.
I am a kindergarten teacher and my kids love all of the Scholastic videos. If I put one on, they pay attention. Always a great value!
my grandson loved it . he has all the books, and this was his first DVD. he enjoyed being able to actually watch it. he was very happy with it.

This DVD is hilariously funny for my preschooler and kindergartener.  They are now reading the Splat the Cat book for themselves, using the voice effects on the DVD.  They also liked the other stories on the DVD.  The stories are all compassionate, fun, and relevant for young children.
